verses.verse: And <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
<S%H551>No<s%> <S%H551>doubt<s%> but you are the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> with you.

But I have <S%H3824>understanding<s%> as <S%H1571>well<s%> as you; I <S%H1961>am<s%> not <S%H5307>inferior<s%> to you: yes, <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H854>knows<s%> not <S%H3644>such<s%> things as <S%H428>these?<s%>

I am as one <S%H7832>mocked<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> who <S%H7121>calls<s%> on <S%H433>God,<s%> and he <S%H6030>answers<s%> him: the <S%H6662>just<s%> <S%H8549>upright<s%> man is <S%H7832>laughed<s%> to scorn.
He that is <S%H3559>ready<s%> to <S%H4571>slip<s%> with his <S%H7272>feet<s%> is as a <S%H3940>lamp<s%> <S%H937>despised<s%> in the <S%H6248>thought<s%> of him that is at <S%H7600>ease.<s%>

The <S%H168>tabernacles<s%> of <S%H7703>robbers<s%> <S%H7951>prosper,<s%> and they that <S%H7264>provoke<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> are <S%H987>secure;<s%> into <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H935>brings<s%> abundantly.
But <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> the <S%H929>beasts,<s%> and they shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> you; and the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>air,<s%> and they shall <S%H5046>tell<s%> you:
<S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H7878>speak<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and it shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> you: and the <S%H1709>fishes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall <S%H5608>declare<s%> to you.
<S%H4310>Who<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> not in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> that the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6213>worked<s%> <S%H2063>this?<s%>
In <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> is the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> thing, and the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>mankind.<s%> <S%H376><s%>
Does not the <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H974>try<s%> <S%H4405>words?<s%> and the <S%H2441>mouth<s%> <S%H2938>taste<s%> his <S%H400>meat?<s%>
With the <S%H3453>ancient<s%> is <S%H2451>wisdom;<s%> and in <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>
With him is <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H1369>strength,<s%> he has <S%H6098>counsel<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> he <S%H2040>breaks<s%> <S%H2040>down,<s%> and it <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H1129>built<s%> again: he <S%H5462>shuts<s%> up a <S%H376>man,<s%> and there can be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6605>opening.<s%>
<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> he <S%H6113>withholds<s%> the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and they <S%H3001>dry<s%> up: also he <S%H7971>sends<s%> them out, and they <S%H2015>overturn<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
With him is <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H8454>wisdom:<s%> the <S%H7683>deceived<s%> and the <S%H7686>deceiver<s%> are his.
He <S%H3212>leads<s%> <S%H3289>counsellors<s%> away <S%H7758>spoiled,<s%> and makes the <S%H8199>judges<s%> <S%H1984>fools.<s%>
He <S%H6605>looses<s%> the <S%H4148>bond<s%> of <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and <S%H631>girds<s%> their <S%H4975>loins<s%> with a <S%H232>girdle.<s%>
He <S%H3212>leads<s%> <S%H3548>princes<s%> away <S%H7758>spoiled,<s%> and <S%H5557>overthrows<s%> the <S%H386>mighty.<s%>
He <S%H5493>removes<s%> away the <S%H8193>speech<s%> of the <S%H539>trusty,<s%> and <S%H3947>takes<s%> away the <S%H2940>understanding<s%> of the <S%H2205>aged.<s%>
He <S%H8210>pours<s%> <S%H937>contempt<s%> on <S%H5081>princes,<s%> and <S%H7503>weakens<s%> the <S%H4206>strength<s%> of the <S%H650>mighty.<s%>
He <S%H1540>discovers<s%> <S%H6013>deep<s%> things out of <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and <S%H3318>brings<s%> out to <S%H216>light<s%> the <S%H6757>shadow<s%> of <S%H6757>death.<s%>
He <S%H7679>increases<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H6>destroys<s%> them: he <S%H7849>enlarges<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H5148>straitens<s%> them again.

He <S%H5493>takes<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and causes them to <S%H8582>wander<s%> in a <S%H8414>wilderness<s%> where there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1870>way.<s%>
They <S%H4959>grope<s%> in the <S%H2822>dark<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> and he makes them to <S%H8582>stagger<s%> like a <S%H7910>drunken<s%> man.
